w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach birthday vocabulary
by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases:
Happy Birthday, he/she, his/her, It’s his birthday, It’s her birthday, How old are you?, I am four years old, I am six years old,
She has cake, It is chocolate cake, I see balloons, I see presents, I blow out the candles.
